sqlMap.select: SELECT TEAM_ID AS teamId, TEAM_NAME AS teamNm, DEPARTMENT_ID AS deptId FROM XM_TEAM WHERE TEAM_ID in((SELECT DISTINCT USER_TEAM_ID FROM XM_MEMBER WHERE USER_DEPARTMENT_ID = #userDept#))
select xt.team_id as teamId, xt.team_name as teamNm, xt.department_id as deptId from xm_team xt, xm_department xd where xt.department_id = xd.department_id and xd.department_id = #deptId#
